This morning, I stumbled upon the following tweet:

https://twitter.com/peteskomoroch/status/292140306806231040

It points to a blog post by Peter Skomoroch in which he gives a nice example of the SLM issue we encountered in our last post. I especially liked the part where he quotes a former lecturer of his:

"You'll start off wanting to measure what you value, but you'll end up valuing what you can measure"

Sounds familiar?
